title: Storm Doris live updates: Latest forecasts, weather warnings, storm tracking maps
text:
Storm Doris live updates: Latest forecasts, weather warnings, storm tracking maps Storm Doris live updates: Latest forecasts, weather warnings, storm tracking maps AS STORM Doris heads towards the UK, here are live updates on the latest forecasts, weather warnings and storm maps. PUBLISHED: 11:14, Tue, Feb 21, 2017 | UPDATED: 11:22, Tue, Feb 21, 2017 Met Office Storm Doris live updates: Latest forecasts, weather warnings, storm map 
Bringing you updated Storm Doris information, live tracking maps, weather models and videos as the storm heads towards the UK. 
The current Storm Doris news you need will be here and updated 24/7 including the all the latest updates from the UK Met office. Related articles Storm Doris threatens mayhem with 100mph gales and torrential rain Tuesday February 21 
10.49am update - A so-called yellow warning of rain and some snowfall has been issued across Northern Ireland between 10pm tomorrow and 2pm on Wednesday. 
10.33am update - Storm Doris has been named by the Met Office. 
The national weather agency said: “Storm Doris is going to push in from the west on Thursday, bringing very strong winds, heavy rain as well as some snowfall in the north.” #StormDoris is going to push in from the west on Thursday, bringing very strong winds, heavy rain as well as some snowfall in the north pic.twitter.com/ZxeYNjQxW0 — Met Office (@metoffice) February 21, 2017 
10.31am update - An amber warning of some very strong winds has been issued for Thursday. 
10.07am update - Yellow wanting of snow has been issued for 2pm on Thursday to 6pm the same night. 
8.50am update - The Met Office has issued a yellow warning of strong winds, with up to 80mph gusts, over parts of the Northern Isles tomorrow. Related articles
